src:
Metalac preuzeo vrh, Kabel pobeđuje i posle kazne
Zemun i Budućnost ponovo izgubili

02 Nov 2019

Oduzeto je Kabelu deset bodova zbog nameštanja, kako su ocenili disciplinci fudbalskog saveza, ali to nije demoralisalo fudbalere ovog tima. Štaviše, Novosađani su nastavili da igraju u istom ritmu kao kada su bili u vrhu tabele, pre kazne. U meču 17. kola Kabel je kao gost pobedio Radnički iz Kragujevca i krenuo ponovo ka gornjem domu tabele – 1:0.
Čak i pored deset oduzetih bodova, tim iz Novog Sada je za tri „kratak“ za mesto u plej-ofu, a mnogo još ima da se igra. Jedini gol, koji je ekipi doneo tri boda u Kragujevcu, postigao je Izečukvu u 33. minutu.
Minimalac vredan tri boda upisao je i Metalac. Tim iz Gornjeg Milanovca je našao izlaz iz krize, pošto prethodno nije ostvario pobedu tri kola zaredom. Ovog puta Radnički iz Pirota je pao na gostovanju kod Metalca, a jedini pogodak postigao je Ješić u 10. minutu – 1:0.
Dva najslabija tima u ligi, Zemun i Budućnost Dobanovci, nastavili su svoje agonije. Zemunci su izgubili kao gosti kod Sinđelića (2:1), dok su Dobanovčani čak poveli protiv Trajala, ali su i pored toga izgubili utakmicu (2:1).

SRBIJA 2 - 17. KOLO: 

PetakBačka – Dinamo Vranje  2:0 (1:0)/Žakula 23, 77/
SubotaRadnički Kragujevac – Kabel  0:1 (0:1)/Izečukvu 33/
Sinđelić – Zemun  2:1 (1:0)/Ilić 15, Joković 87 – Vukajlović 55p/
Trajal – Budućnost  2:1  (1:1)/Juf 39, Kecap 60 – Perić 5/
Metalac - Radnički Pirot  1:0 (1:0)/Ješić 10/
Nedelja13.30: Zlatibor - Novi Pazar17.00: Kolubara - Smederevo
Ponedeljak13.30: Žarkovo - Grafičar
text:
Metalac takes over, Cable wins after the penalty
Zemun and Future lost again

02 Nov 2019

Cable was stripped of ten points for pitching, as judged by the disciplines of the football association, but that did not demoralize this team's footballers. Moreover, the Novi Sad continued to play at the same pace as when they were at the top of the table, before the penalty. In the match of the 17th round, Kabel defeated Radnicki from Kragujevac as a guest and went back to the top table home - 1-0.
Even with ten points deducted, the Novi Sad team is three short for a place in the playoffs, and there is still a lot to play. The only goal that gave the team three points in Kragujevac was scored by Izecukva in the 33rd minute.
Metalac also scored a minimum of three points. The team from Gornji Milanovac found a way out of the crisis, having previously failed to win three rounds in a row. This time Radnicki from Pirot fell away to Metalac, with Jesic scoring the only goal in the 10th minute - 1-0.
Two of the weakest teams in the league, Zemun and Future Dobanovci, continued their agony. The Zemuns lost as guests to Sinđelić (2: 1), while the Dobanovci even led against Trajal, but still lost the match (2: 1).

SERBIA 2 - ROUND 17:

PetakBacka - Dinamo Vranje 2: 0 (1: 0) / Zacula 23, 77 /
SaturdayRadnicki Kragujevac - Kabel 0: 1 (0: 1) / Izechukvu 33 /
Sindjelic - Zemun 2: 1 (1: 0) / Ilic 15, Jokovic 87 - Vukajlovic 55p /
Trajal - Buducnost 2: 1 (1: 1) / Juf 39, Kecap 60 - Peric 5 /
Metalac - Radnicki Pirot 1: 0 (1: 0) / Jesic 10 /
Sunday13.30: Zlatibor - Novi Pazar17.00: Kolubara - Smederevo
Monday13.30: Žarkovo - Graphic artist
